title: A Year in Reading: Our Favorite Books of 2021
sub_head: An “In Case You Missed It” guide to all of the end-of-the-year features from the books section.
body: As we pause to say goodbye to a year overstuffed with wonderful reading, the WSJ Books staff has been looking back over a busy season, summing up our favorite new works and recommendations from voices all over the globe. We know our readers have been busy too—so consider this an “In Case You Missed It” guide to our end-of-the-year features. It all adds up to a unique portrait of the year in books, and a chance to discover a book that might just be your first great read of 2022.
